item.title: About
item.description:
I’m a security enthusiast interested in browser security and binary exploitation.

Currently studying for a master’s degree in Secure Systems Laboratory1 of National Taiwan University.

During my free time, I play CTFs with Goburin’ or ⚔️TSJ⚔️.

Education

  • M.S. 2021/09 ~ Present

    • National Taiwan University
    • Graduate Institute of Networking and Multimedia

  • B.S. 2017/09 ~ 2021/01

    • National Chung Cheng University
    • Department of Computer Science and Information Engineering

Work Experience

  • Security Researcher Intership 2022/04 ~ 2022/07
    • DEVCORE

CTFs

International

2022

  • 9th, DEF CON CTF 2022 Las Vegas, United States
    • Balsn.217@TSJ.tw
  • 1st, UIUCTF 2022 Online
    • TTT
  • 2nd, DEF CON CTF Qualifier 2022 Online
    • Balsn.217@TSJ.tw

    • Goburin'
